resources.string: Choose a user to begin tracking

Start real-time tracking on your smartphone. User Tracker Application is perfect for personal use (tracking of family members, friends etc.) or businesses (tracking and managing employees). Get various notifications and reports, get directions to your destination, distance, travel history, stopovers and many more. Choose one of the map, including: Satellite, Google, OSM and start using our GPS user tracking system. 

Copyright @2022, all right reserved. 

Version 1.0

After successful login, choose either to track you current location (Track Self) or another user\'s location (Track User). \nNote for you to be able to track another user, you need Admin access key in order to gain access to the admin Dashboard.
